CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic sync
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Update folders selected for offline use on a regular basis. GC Mobile must be ONLINE and an Internet connection available for auto sync to work.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Folders selected for offline use will only be updated when GC Mobile is toggled between ONLINE and OFFLINE modes manually.

ListPreference.android:title: Sync schedule
ListPreference.android:summary: The sync schedule controls how often auto sync will update folders selected for offline use.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Secure synchronization
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Secure sync uses strong encryption to update folders selected for offline use. It is slower than regular sync but keeps your data safe during transit.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Updates to folders selected for offline use will not use encryption. Enable this if your data includes confidential or personal information.
